title: 2 Euro - Philippe (200 years of the University of Ghent)

composition.text: Bimetallic: nickel brass clad nickel centre in copper-nickel ring

obverse.description: The logo of the Ghent University, with the dates 1817 - 2017 below, surrounded by the inscription "200 JAAR UNIVERSITEIT GENT – 200 YEARS GHENT UNIVERSITY" and the country indication BE. The mintmark of Brussels, a helmeted head of the Archangel Michael and the mint directors’ mintmark, the coat of arms of the municipality Herzele, are located respectively on the right and left of the country indication. The coin’s outer ring depicts the 12 stars of the European flag.
obverse.lettering:
1817 2017
200 JAAR UNIVERSITEIT GENT — 200 YEARS GHENT UNIVERSITY  
BE
obverse.lettering_translation:
1817-2017
200 Years of the University of Ghent - 200 Years of the University of Ghent
BE

reverse.description: A map, next to the face value, shows the European continent without borders.

commemorated_topic: 200 years of the University of Ghent
comments: The edge of the type r1 - the outline star at the beginning of a segment. See details at http://eucoins.byethost9.com/be.html

related_types.title: 2 Euro - Philippe (200 years of the University of Liège)

edge.description: Reeded with inscription: next numeral "2" everted with respect to the pervious, one of the stars is outlined.
